page.title: 16A WALK IN THE NEW FOREST
page.content: After eating lunch at North gate and playing in a little copse we walked on our walk. We covered many miles of different earth. We covered sand,soil, marsh,and bog.After going quite a way we met a little old man. He was walking from Surrey to visit his son in Lands-end.He stopped and talked to us for a while and said his wife had recently died. We said goodbye and went on. The walk was begining to tire me out and I began to drag behind with my friends. We walked over a hole dug for the pipe being built and walked through Roman Road on the way back. I staggered into the school gates and went for a drink of water.I enjoyed my walk.
